QuestData.Title: Cleaving Time
QuestData.Description: I, Gamon, have come through the dark portal to cleave many orc skulls. Yet my weapon has not kept pace with my rage, and is nicked and dull.$B$BFind me a new weapon - one that is good for removing Hellscream limbs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find an Iron Limbcleaver in Grimrail Depot.
